card.name: Abyssal Horror
card.text: Flying When Abyssal Horror enters the battlefield, target player discards two cards.

card.name: Alluring Scent
card.text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

card.name: Ancient Craving
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Angel of Light
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Angel of Mercy
card.text: Flying When Angel of Mercy enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

card.name: Angelic Blessing
card.text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Archangel
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Armageddon
card.text: Destroy all lands.

card.name: Bargain
card.text: Target opponent draws a card. You gain 7 life.

card.name: Blinding Light
card.text: Tap all nonwhite creatures.

card.name: Breath of Life
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Champion Lancer
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Champion Lancer by creatures.

card.name: Charging Paladin
card.text: Whenever Charging Paladin attacks, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Chorus of Woe
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Cinder Storm
card.text: Cinder Storm deals 7 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Coercion
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Counterspell
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Dakmor Ghoul
card.text: When Dakmor Ghoul enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Dakmor Lancer
card.text: When Dakmor Lancer enters the battlefield, destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Dakmor Plague
card.text: Dakmor Plague deals 3 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Dakmor Sorceress
card.text: Dakmor Sorceress's power is equal to the number of Swamps you control.

card.name: Dark Offering
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.

card.name: Denizen of the Deep
card.text: When Denizen of the Deep enters the battlefield, return each other creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Devastation
card.text: Destroy all creatures and lands.

card.name: Devout Monk
card.text: When Devout Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Dread Reaper
card.text: Flying When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

card.name: Exhaustion
card.text: Creatures and lands target opponent controls don't untap during his or her next untap step.

card.name: Extinguish
card.text: Counter target sorcery spell.

card.name: Eye Spy
card.text: Look at the top card of target player's library. You may put that card into his or her graveyard.

card.name: False Peace
card.text: Target player skips all combat phases of his or her next turn.

card.name: Fire Tempest
card.text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

card.name: Gerrard's Wisdom
card.text: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.

card.name: Goblin Commando
card.text: When Goblin Commando enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

card.name: Goblin General
card.text: Whenever Goblin General attacks, Goblin creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Goblin Glider
card.text: Flying Goblin Glider can't block.

card.name: Goblin Lore
card.text: Draw four cards, then discard three cards at random.

card.name: Goblin Settler
card.text: When Goblin Settler enters the battlefield, destroy target land.

card.name: Gravedigger
card.text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Grim Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library. You lose 3 life.

card.name: Hand of Death
card.text: Destroy target nonblack creature.

card.name: Hollow Dogs
card.text: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Howling Fury
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Hulking Goblin
card.text: Hulking Goblin can't block.

card.name: Hulking Ogre
card.text: Hulking Ogre can't block.

card.name: Ingenious Thief
card.text: Flying When Ingenious Thief enters the battlefield, look at target player's hand.

card.name: Jagged Lightning
card.text: Jagged Lightning deals 3 damage to each of two target creatures.

card.name: Last Chance
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player.

card.name: Lone Wolf
card.text: You may have Lone Wolf assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Loyal Sentry
card.text: When Loyal Sentry blocks a creature, destroy that creature and Loyal Sentry.

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.text: Target player discards two cards.

card.name: Monstrous Growth
card.text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Natural Spring
card.text: Target player gains 8 life.

card.name: Nature's Cloak
card.text: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Nature's Lore
card.text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Owl Familiar
card.text: Flying When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Path of Peace
card.text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.

card.name: Phantom Warrior
card.text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

card.name: Piracy
card.text: Until end of turn, you may tap lands you don't control for mana. Spend this mana only to cast spells.

card.name: Pride of Lions
card.text: You may have Pride of Lions assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Psychic Transfer
card.text: If the difference between your life total and target player's life total is 5 or less, exchange life totals with that player.

card.name: Raise Dead
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Ransack
card.text: Look at the top five cards of target player's library. Put any number of them on the bottom of that library in any order and the rest on top of the library in any order.

card.name: Ravenous Rats
card.text: When Ravenous Rats enters the battlefield, target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Relearn
card.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Remove Soul
card.text: Counter target creature spell.

card.name: Renewing Touch
card.text: Shuffle any number of target creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

card.name: Righteous Charge
card.text: Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Righteous Fury
card.text: Destroy all tapped creatures. You gain 2 life for each creature destroyed this way.

card.name: Royal Trooper
card.text: Whenever Royal Trooper blocks, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Sacred Nectar
card.text: You gain 4 life.

card.name: Scorching Spear
card.text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Serpent Warrior
card.text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

card.name: Shrieking Specter
card.text: Flying Whenever Shrieking Specter attacks, defending player discards a card.

card.name: Sleight of Hand
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Soul Feast
card.text: Target player loses 4 life and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Spitting Earth
card.text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

card.name: Squall
card.text: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Steadfastness
card.text: Creatures you control get +0/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Stone Rain
card.text: Destroy target land.

card.name: Stream of Acid
card.text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature.

card.name: Summer Bloom
card.text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

card.name: Sylvan Basilisk
card.text: Whenever Sylvan Basilisk becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature.

card.name: Sylvan Yeti
card.text: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: Thorn Elemental
card.text: You may have Thorn Elemental assign its combat damage as though it weren't blocked.

card.name: Thunder Dragon
card.text: Flying When Thunder Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Tidings
card.text: Draw four cards.

card.name: Time Ebb
card.text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Time Warp
card.text: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Touch of Brilliance
card.text: Draw two cards.

card.name: Tremor
card.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Undo
card.text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Untamed Wilds
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Venerable Monk
card.text: When Venerable Monk enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Vengeance
card.text: Destroy target tapped creature.

card.name: Volcanic Hammer
card.text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Whirlwind
card.text: Destroy all creatures with flying.

card.name: Wicked Pact
card.text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

card.name: Wind Sail
card.text: One or two target creatures gain flying until end of turn.

card.name: Wood Elves
card.text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
